Krisztián Hofstädter

deeper

A music release with dark electronic music.

time: May 2009

tags: music, music release, dark, game music, remix


credits: Victoria and Jacob, Yahya Mesekiran (cover art).
tools: Logic, Rob Papen’s Predator AU and Waldorf Blofeld


Life of Pi

Life of Pi game is an ARU final project at the Computer Gaming Tech dep. Pi is a robot whose quest is to escape from the factory where it was manufactured. Programmer: Thomas Linthe, modeller: Liszkai József.


Deadly Escape

Deadly Escape is a 3D cyberpunk western styled first person shooter where the player is on a quest to find water. More info on Brian Cox’ site.
